archiefmat.titel: 'Generael Kerckeboek van Suriname', bevattend inschrijving van gedoopten, getrouwden en aangenomen lidmaten door de Nederduitse en Franse predikanten van de Hervormde Kerk in Paramaribo, enz.
archiefmat.titel_eng: 'General Church Register of Suriname', containing registrations of persons who were baptised, married and admitted as members by Dutch and French ministers of the Reformed Church in Paramaribo
archiefmat.notes:
The period 1687-1725 concerns copies from the original church registers.

See also the Nationaal Archief (NA) website, Collectie - Indexen.
